name: Wall Smasher
description:
Welcome to Wall Smasher!

Smash walls, scaffolding, barricades and more!

This was my first major project for university, I gave it a bit of polish for this release but it's still just a prototype. 

All content apart from the audio and humanoid mesh was created by me.

Controls

Move the character with WASD

Move the camera with the mouse

Use the F key to pick them up

Press the E key to throw

Enjoy!
